hero.title: Discover Central Mountain Asturias
hero.subtitle: A unique destination where nature, heritage and tradition meet in perfect harmony
hero.backgroundAlt: Panoramic view of the Asturian mountains

quickActions.title: What are you interested in doing?
quickActions.subtitle: Explore everything Central Mountain Asturias has to offer
quickActions.accommodationDesc: Find the perfect place for your stay
quickActions.routesDesc: Discover unique trails and spectacular landscapes

chatbot.title: Tourism Assistant
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your virtual tourism assistant. How can I help you today?

suggestions.routes: What hiking routes do you recommend?

responses.routes: I recommend several routes according to your level. Do you prefer something easy, moderate or challenging?
responses.accommodation: We have excellent accommodation options throughout the area. Are you looking for something specific?
responses.events: There are several interesting upcoming events. Are you interested in any particular theme?
responses.weather: Current conditions are favorable for outdoor activities. Are you planning any specific activity?
responses.default: I understand you're looking for information about Central Mountain Asturias. Can you be more specific about what interests you?

footer.description: Discover the essence of Asturias in the Central Mountain, where every trail tells a story.
footer.euFunding: Project funded by the European Union - NextGenerationEU

cookies.title: Cookie Settings
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and offer you personalized content. You can accept all cookies or customize your preferences.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for basic website functionality. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to show relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness.

personalization.title: Personalization Cookies
personalization.description: Allow remembering your preferences to offer a personalized experience.

kiosk.title: Central Mountain Asturias
kiosk.subtitle: Explore everything this unique destination has to offer
kiosk.selectOption: What would you like to discover?

inactivity.title: Are you still there?
inactivity.message: The screen will return to the start in:
